name: Outlaws Burgers & Fries
text:
Combos
INCLUDES FRIES & FOUNTAIN DRINK

OUTLAW SINGLE LETTUCE, TOMATO, PICKLES, GRILLED ONIONS & MUSHROOMS, KETCHUP, MUSTARD, MAYO BURGER $7.95 COMBO $13.95

OUTLAW DOUBLE LETTUCE, TOMATO, PICKLES, GRILLED ONIONS & MUSHROOMS, KETCHUP, MUSTARD, MAYO BURGER $9.95 COMBO $15.95

OUTLAW TRIPLE LETTUCE, TOMATO, PICKLES, GRILLED ONIONS & MUSHROOMS, KETCHUP, MUSTARD, MAYO BURGER $11.95 COMBO $17.95

RENEGADE LETTUCE, TOMATO, BACON, GRILLED ONIONS & MUSHROOMS, JALAPENO CHEESE SAUCE BURGER $9.25 COMBO $15.25

MUSHROOM SWISS LETTUCE, TOMATO, PICKLES, SWISS, GRILLED MUSHROOMS, GARLIC AIOLI SAUCE BURGER $8.95 COMBO $14.95

VEGGIE LETTUCE, TOMATO, PICKLES, GRILLED ONIONS & MUSHROOMS, KETCHUP, MUSTARD, MAYO BURGER $8.95 COMBO $14.95

GRILLED CHICKEN LETTUCE, TOMATO, MAYO BURGER $10.95 COMBO $16.95

CRISPY CHICKEN LETTUCE, TOMATO, MAYO BURGER $10.25 COMBO $16.25

HOT DOG *CHOOSE YOUR OWN TOPPINGS HOT DOG $6.75 COMBO $12.75

CHICKEN FINGERS 2 CHICKEN STRIPS, SMALL FRIES & FOUNTAIN DRINK COMBO $9.45

WESTERN BBQ SAUCE, PICKLES, CHEESE, BACON, GRILLED ONIONS, CRISPY ONIONS BURGER $9.25 COMBO $15.25

FREE EXTRA TOPPINGS
JALAPENOS / RAW ONIONS / GREEN PEPPERS / RELISH / BBQ SAUCE/ CHIPOTLE SAUCE

BURGER ADD ONS
BACON 2.00 CHEESE 0.75 JALAPENO CHEESE SAUCE $1.50 AVOCADO 2.20 GLUTEN FREE BUN $2.95

SIDES
SALTED OR CAJUN

FRIES SMALL $5.25 LARGE $6.75 POUTINE $7.85 ONION RINGS $5.95 YAM FRIES $5.95 DEEP FRIED PICKLES WITH BUTTERMILK DILL DIP (6) $9.25 MOZZARELLA STICKS WITH MARINARA DIP (6) $10.25 GARDEN SALAD BALSAMIC / THOUSAND ISLAND / RANCH / OIL & VINEGAR / ITALIAN $6.75 GRAVY 1.25

SIDE DIPS
CHIPOTLE / MAYO / RANCH $1.50

DRINKS
FOUNTAIN DRINK $3.00 BOTTLED WATER 2.50 JUICE APPLE / ORANGE $2.95 MILK 2% / CHOCOLATE 3.45 SNAPPLE ICED TEA LEMON / PEACH $3.75
